summary: Provides a specialized checkpoint callback that extends PyTorch Lightning's ModelCheckpoint to automatically serialize NeMo models into .nemo files, track a monitored metric to keep the best checkpoint, manage exponential moving average copies, and clean up incomplete or excess checkpoints in distributed training environments.
business_intent: Ensures robust model versioning and resource management for NeMo-based AI solutions, enabling reliable deployment of the highest‑performing model while simplifying checkpoint handling in large‑scale training pipelines.
